predicate.note: Frames file for 'whisk' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to move or cause to move

example.name: passive
example.text: Visitors , [*-2] whisked [*] from the Strip on a moving walkway , will glide over a habitat for rare white tigers , which [*T*-1] will star in performances by the famed illusionist team of Siegfried & Roy .
